name: Content Protection
author: Themexa

sections.description:
WordPress content protection plugin to protect content with login from logged out visitors.

Core Features:

  • Protect All Content (Posts/Pages Everything)
  • Protect Selected Content (Selected Post Type)
  • Protect All Except Selected (All Except Selected Post Type)
  • Set Custom Login Redirection URL

Support

24/7 Dedicated Support. Our support quality is second to none.

Email Support: Themexa Support Email

Live Chat Support: Contact Themexa Live Chat Support

24/7 Dedicated Support: Themexa Support
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip file.
  2. Extract the downloaded zip file.
  3. Upload the plugin directory to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is it completely FREE?

YES! Your server files are your property. So is this plugin after you install it.

Can I get support for this plugin?

Definitely! We provide support for anything related to WordPress.
